headline: Dow Jones Tops 50,000 With Apple, Boeing, These AI Stocks New Buys, But Market Still Divided
summary: The Dow Jones topped 50,000 for the first time, with JPMorgan, Apple and Boeing in buy areas. The Nasdaq is ailing, but these AI stocks are reviving.

headline: Here's Why GE Vernova Stock Keeps Soaring in 2026
summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) application-led demand is driving soaring power orders at the General Electric spinoff.

raw.headline: Here's Why GE Vernova Stock Keeps Soaring in 2026
raw.summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) application-led demand is driving soaring power orders at the General Electric spinoff.

headline: GE Vernova Alliance Links Data Center Power, Grid Upgrades And Valuation Risks
summary: GE Vernova (NYSE:GEV) has entered a multi year alliance with Xcel Energy that includes multi gigawatt capacity reservations for wind and gas turbines. The collaboration also covers grid modernization, artificial intelligence applications and joint R&D for power systems that serve data centers and the wider grid through the 2030s. Separately, the U.S. government has created a critical minerals reserve that is explicitly backed by GE Vernova, targeting stronger supply security for electrical...
